reviews.review: Игра превратилась в говно-реку, где плавают все быдло и читеры. Соревновательный убит в хлам, нихуя нормального нету, на игру забили болт.

This game used to be good now its very bad. Valve treats it's players like garbage. Doesn't take advice from communitty adds awful microtransactions like sprays when they used to be free, the worst ranking system you have ever seen, terrible community, hackers and griefers are everywhere 
Save your time and mnoey don't buy this Game

почему меня палят по голосоваму чату=(

Csgo is a game with cooldowns from 30 minutes to 7 days that are easly exploited, and some of them like cooldown for kicking too much teammates or getting kicked many times its ridiculous. Ranks are not needed as anyone can use a derank bot or simply buy a new account to garante you find people way worse than you. Gamemodes are boring and most people prefer to only play competitive; example arms race, or "gungame", used to be a fun gamemode from time to time in old titles of cs, but in csgo it just doesn't feel right. Finally, the community, I start to think csgo players are either aliens trying to learn basic human interactions for the first time, that or normal people slowly corrupted by this game; a good way to play this game is by muting the 7 players of your game, and later in the game see a vote kick with your name, and then you get a cooldown for getting kicked too many times. The community, the bugs and the ranks can corrupt a normal person faster than vodka. Don't play this game if you care about your mental stability.
Не игра - а наркотик какой-то) Впочем, чему удивляться - это же CS. Но скажу одно - без системы рангов игра была куда-лучше.
